answers.answer: This again? The exam is on Saturday, 12/10/2022 from 11:30 am - 2:30 pm in COB2-140. Please take note of this in the future.
Do you even go to lectures? The lecturer is Dr. Angelo Kyrilov. This question was kind of embarrassing if you ask me.
Are you calculating if you can pass the course? The final exam is worth 50% of your grade. Good luck, you are going to need it (:

Who is this nerd? The topics of this course are C++ basics Variables and types Operators, User I/O Control flow, Test-driven development, Pointers and pointer arithmetic, Dynamic memory allocation, Object-based programming, Encapsulation, Constructors and destructors, Operator overloading, Memory management, Standard Template Library, Problem solving techniques. Touch grass.

Surely just collaboration (;. Instructors will specify what type of collaboration is allowed or disallowed for a given assignment, and students should strictly follow the provided guidelines. When in doubt, students should contact the instructor and ask for clarification.. Please take note of this in the future.
